body: Yeah, Kon-chan’s getting my vote. At this point, it just makes more sense even if she’s rather…extreme with her dominance.

@compassionated love agree with the forcing in kaede's story part. But more than half of the story we only see ko-chan. kaede swooping in in the middle, story wise is just forced and a turn off. It would be better is she already appear at the beginning and manabu almost feel attached to her before ko-chan does her thing. It spices up the entire story to make ko-chan think that shehas a rival from the start and it encourages her to be more aggressive. There are actually some story I liked that did this. Examples are 380477 and 351440. Both secondary  female characters there are close to their respective mc, its noticable that they really are fond of them. When the respective fmc took their crush they decided to be aggressive as well. The story is just so hot, not to mention the clothed paizuri scenes!!!

Ofcourse the best choice will be Kon-chan since the bastard has been with her for half and a quarter of his damned life. While the library girl didnt even see him for a week.
